alert.note: Alert for Guilford; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Randolph and southeastern Guilford Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Randleman, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Asheboro, Randleman, McLeansville, Gibsonville, Pleasant Garden, Ramseur, Franklinville, Climax and Lake Guilford Mackintosh Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
